On Tue, Jun 12, 2007 at 11:37:14PM +0100, Bill de hOra wrote:
> Mike Dierken wrote:
> > 
> > 
> > How about somebody go and implement an example of a RESTful approach
> > to a queue using only HTTP and document it.
> 
> 
> http://www.dehora.net/doc/httplr/draft-httplr-01.html#rfc.section.9
> 
> I'm sure I would change some things on reflection.

That looks pretty well thought out... but it also takes three requests
to do a single pop. That strikes me as a lot of overhead.

I wonder if this case is just better served by an RPC or POX approach.

-- 

Paul Winkler
http://www.slinkp.com
